author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-2539 Turn of jar caching for URLconnection and port service discovery over to use URLConnetion to open streams. Prevents Tuscany from holding the stream open for Jar contributions

author: veithen
msg: HttpCoreNIOListenerTest: Allow to easily switch between NIO and Axis' blocking HTTP transport, so that we can compare the behavior of the two implementations. (+ necessary refactorings in the test kit)

msg: #0000 - Use scheduler to reschedule jobs instead of starting own threads.
